'''Entanglement of Past Dreams''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during {{Quest|The Formula for a Miracle}}.

==Trial Character==
{{Transclude|The Formula for a Miracle|Trial Character}}

==Walkthrough==
# Defeat the enemies in the first room:
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*2;Hilichurl Fighter}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*2;Hilichurl Fighter*2}}
# Go through the metal door
# Proceed deeper
# Activate the mechanism
# Proceed to the room with 3 green barriers (left, center, right)
#* Push the mechanism towards a barrier and activate it to dispel
# Dispel the left barrier (optional)
#* Common Chest
# Dispel the right barrier
#* Defeat the enemies:
#** Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Hilichurl;Hilichurl Shooter}}
#** Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Geovishap Hatchling*2}}
#* Exquisite Chest
# Go through the newly unlocked door
# Activate the door mechanism
# Push the mechanism out into the main room
# Dispel the center barrier
#* The mechanism closer to the barrier cannot be activated on its own
#* Move the farther mechanism within range and use it to activate the closer mechanism
# Proceed to the final room
#* Common Chest
# Defeat the enemy:
#* {{Enemy|Geovishap|text="Geovishap" &mdash; One to Whom the Chi's Loathsome Blood Clings}}

==Chests==
* {{Item|Common Chest|x=2}}
